dict.acceptation: 航行；开船；（水禽）游泳；驾驶（船）；
帆船；航行；帆状物；航行距离；

sent.orig: That a China-made sail from Shanghai to sail to the United States. began its first voyage.
sent.trans: 这一艘中国制造的新船从上海起航。驶向美国。开始了它的第一次航行。

sent.orig: Kids when are you going to sail to sail into washing your dirty clothes.
sent.trans: 孩子们，你们打算什么时候开始洗你们这些脏衣服？

sent.orig: Better to sail slowly than not to sail at all.
sent.trans: 完全停滞不前不如慢慢驶向前。

sent.orig: Sail on lilver girl, sail on by, Your time has come to shine.
sent.trans: 启航吧，向前航，你的时代即将大放光芒。

sent.orig: There's a sail locker under the wheel deck.
sent.trans: 在甲板的轮子下面有个航行用的小橱柜。
